  • Class Summary 
    Class Description
    ComTLSConnection  
    ComTLSConnectionHandler  
    ComTLSConnectionListener  
    SecureRandomProvider.Default
    returns a null secureRandom to use the system default SecureRandom
    TLSKeyManagerProvider.Default
    uses system default key manager
    TLSKeyManagerProvider.PKCS12
    Provide a PKCS12 KeyManger
    TLSParametersProvider.Default
    Provides a nearly empty SSLParameters object.
    TLSTrustManagerProvider.Default
    uses system default trust manager
    TLSTrustManagerProvider.PKCS12
    Provide a PKCS12 TrustManager
